data.title: 计划列表
data.schema:
function({_req}) {
  const pageIndex = Number(_req.query.pageIndex || 0);
  const pageSize = Number(_req.query.pageSize || 10);
  const current = pageIndex * pageSize;
  return {
    total: 500,
    count: 500,
    rows: new Array(pageSize).fill(0).map((_, index) => {
      const campaign_status = Math.floor(Math.random() * 4) + 1;
      return {
        "contract_item_id": 41383 + current,
        "contract_no": "KABP_1C83ABC871A216FB44036468A4C9470D" + campaign_status,
        "contract_name": "",
        "resource_name": "微博客户端开机首刷" + campaign_status,
        "creative_id": 16699 + campaign_status,
        "creative_name": "崔萌萌__20230726" + campaign_status,
        "resource_details": "微博客户端开机首刷[大出框,Maxvision,优选触达,外链,不限,不限,静态按钮]CPD",
        "batch_uid": "KABP_1C83ABC871A216FB44036468A4C9470D_NO20230726_180625",
        "app": "微博主端",
        "scheduled_days": 1,
        "start_date": "2023-08-31",
        "end_date": "2023-08-31",
        "is_rush": 0,
        "position_name": "微博客户端开机首刷",
        "product_line": 2,
        "sales_type": 1,
        "sales_type_name": "首刷CPD",
        "media_type": 1516,
        "media_type_name": "Maxvision",
        "interaction_type": 1561,
        "interaction_type_name": "优选触达-静态按钮",
        "increment_type_name": "大出框",
        "increment_type": [
          1577
        ],
        "condition_setting": "平台,性别",
        "suit_name": null,
        "customer_name": "",
        "source_name": "KABP",
        "company_name": "",
        "customer_id": 0,
        "sales_name": null,
        "media_name": "崔萌萌",
        "media_num": "213451",
        "ae_name": "罗亮",
        "ae_num": "14345",
        "creative_status": 2,
        "target_impression": campaign_status * 10,
        "current_impression": 60,
        "progress_desc": null,
        "campaign_status": campaign_status,
        "campaign_id": 26404267,
        "campaign_name": "崔萌萌__20230726" + campaign_status,
        "monitor_type_name": "无",
        "is_rpm": "否",
        "pdps": "PDPS000000066785",
        "delivery_type": 1,
        "biz_scene": "BOOT",
        "wax_total_count": null,
        "wax_pass_count": null,
        "wax_wait_audit_count": null,
        "wax_reject_count": null,
        "reject_reason": null,
        "dsp_id": 0
      };
    })
  }
}
